api_discovery_schema_v1.description: Clean schema for API discovery system - focused on user research needs

fields.name: string - API display name
fields.description: string - what data/service this API provides

discovery_status.description: Where we are in the research process

access_info.requires_approval: boolean - true if manual approval process
access_info.rate_limits: string - calls per minute/hour/day if known

technical_info.base_url: string - API base URL if known

content_summary.historical_data: boolean - true if historical data available

research_notes.sample_endpoints: array - list of key endpoints discovered
research_notes.last_researched: ISO date - when we last checked this API
